effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's accuracy by six stages.

This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises accuracy by six stages in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
命中を　ものすごく　あげる。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

It raises the accuracy of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta incredibilmente la precisione di un
Pokémon in una lotta. L’effetto svanisce se il
Pokémon è sostituito.

Punta que permite separar a Kyurem del Pokémon
con el que se ha fusionado.

Hebt die Genauigkeit eines Pokémon im Kampf
enorm an. Die Wirkung endet mit dem Austausch
des Pokémon.

Augmente fortement la Précision pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe si le Pokémon
se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 명중률을
엄청나게 올린다. 포켓몬을 볼에
넣어버리면 원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
めいちゅうを　ものすごく　あげる。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

It raises the accuracy of a Pokémon in
battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

It raises the accuracy of a Pokémon in
battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte fortement la Précision pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe
si le Pokémon se retire.
